full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA MI 'KHRUGS PA LA MDO CHOG GI LUGS BZHIN MCHOD CING GSOL BA BTAB PA'I RIM PA MNGON DGA' ZHING DU BGROD PA'I 'PHRUL GYI GRU GZINGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA MI 'KHRUGS PA LA MDO CHOG GI LUGS BZHIN MCHOD CING GSOL BA BTAB PA'I RIM PA MNGON DGA' ZHING DU BGROD PA'I 'PHRUL GYI GRU GZINGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS MTHUN GROGS PA SHES MKHYEN LDAN DKA' BCU BDE SKYID DPAL GYIS GZHAN PHAN GYI LHAG BSAM DKAR BAS LHA DAR DANG RGYA SGOR GYI RTEN DANG BCAS TE BSKUL MA BYUNG BA BZHIN, ,RANG NYID KYANG MOS 'DUN GYIS MTSAMS SBYAR TE, ^ SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG RTA DBYANGS MING PAS HAL HA DBUS RU'I KLUNG CHEN THO'U LA'I NUB 'BRAM GYI CHAR GSAR BSGRIGS BYAS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'BREL THOGS SKYE 'GRO RNAMS DANG MNGON DGA' ZHING DU MI BSKYOD RGYAL BA'I MDUN SAR PHAN TSUN BSHES BZHIN DU MJAL BA'I RGYU BYED PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
